channel.title: IRC Problems
channel.description:
So tonight mass invites and a few (small) botnets have joined #mopar Aswell as joining a channel me, Cowie and newbiehacker were in on tty2.
It's clearly therefore someone from this community, We've had about 50 people in the channel at time of writing this. Massive amounts of bans and kicks, Delta has klined a few people. It's still going on now, ffs.
Can we get some better protections, and more hops/ops etc.
We're heading towards being kicked off another network if this continues, it's ridiculous and childish.
[/rant]

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Lothy:

that pours out of my mouth

I dont think the word pours is very accurate Lothy, it’s more like floods.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I’ve been pretty busy lately, so I haven’t been online as much.

Having said that, newbiehacker told me about the events earlier today - I’ve already put Greeny on the halfop list.

I definitely wouldn’t suggest clowns like rictoo and lawl though. The place would be a joke.

ThugLife is alright, regardless of any race related stuff that pours out of my mouth, so he could do ok. Similar story for Silver Lining.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Im at a mates house atm, but anyway I left at 8p gmt so ill check my logs when I get back to see how things have “changed”. I think my computers still on so I may still be in #mopar as “G`Out”.

Stork is active. I think he’d be trustworthy.
Lawl is too immature

…and Ikiliki sorry I don’t why you were banned, during the “attacks” after Newbiehacker had gone I needed some assistance and as a moderator and #moparscape OP I thought Silab would be a trustworthy choice.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:9, topic:156566”]Anyway, i agree more active better ops i personally think these people would do good:

[ul][li]Stork - He was one before but was removed when he stop coming on the channel but is back now[/li]
[li]Greeny - Since newbiehacker opped him to help out he has done nothing but helped keep the channel out of trouble when someone was mass inviting people to the channel and other shit.[/li]
[li]sppt - Always been a nice member, never seen him be an idiot, active.[/li]
[li]WhiteCastle - Mature, never messes around would make a great op[/li][/ul][/quote]

Stork - I’d prefer him of all people do get power once more, when he had OP Before the channel was less over run by morons.
Silab - I reckon it’d be an improvement if she had OP On #mopar, most people " respect " her and she does seem to have a good understanding of when to act mature and when to let loose abit.

Those are my suggestions.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

On another topic

why do you people care

Actually, there have been 100s of times when there has been situations where someone needs banning and there was not an op around to sort it, like when xerxes_ took over the channel and i somehow got caught up in and got blamed, no one could get into the channel for ages because there was not an active op on at the time.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well i don’t think it was really a botnet, just 2 or 3 proxy lists since there was 3 different ips but they all shared the same ident, meaning i only had to gline the ident to get rid of them all when they “flooded”, tty2/sharesource.

Anyway, i agree more active better ops i personally think these people would do good:

[ul][li]Stork - He was one before but was removed when he stop coming on the channel but is back now[/li]
[li]Greeny - Since newbiehacker opped him to help out he has done nothing but helped keep the channel out of trouble when someone was mass inviting people to the channel and other shit.[/li]
[li]sppt - Always been a nice member, never seen him be an idiot, active.[/li]
[li]WhiteCastle - Mature, never messes around would make a great op[/li][/ul]

If you are unsure then just make a few of them hop(halfop) for while, see how they go, that way they can do no real damage if they decide to ‘abuse’ their powers.

Also, the person who was mass inviting was ‘halo2fan’ who is some idiot from sythe (the only rs cheating community worse than us! :)) he’s been glined and it stopped after that, so we know that wasnt any of our doing.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

I have talked with Delta, and i told him that he shouldn’t target our channel(s) to be banned/deleted or anything of the sort because from what i knew, nobody we knew was doing it. I do think, that having OPERATORS in the channel who are active and on a lot will help a lot since the channel moderation is very poor. We won’t be kicked off DaIRC, unless something really bad happens which i doubt will happen, so no need to worry. DaIRC > Freenode!

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

It’s happened on a few channels on a few networks.

I was on TTY2 With Greeny and Newbiehacker in #java, it happened then.
I was on TTY2 In my channel, it happened then.

I was on Deltaanime, and on the #mopar channel, it happened around 3 or 4 times, and newbiehacker and greeny were banning them, each time more and more came in, I don’t know of the Net Admins in the channel, but I’m sure I don’t want us to be kicked off another network.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Problems
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Erm, 45 people on 20+ are invited people/bots.

It is possible to choose decent hops/ops/aops. I’ve been OP for the past 3 hours and have i abused?

Names that come to mind who could be trusted;
sppt
MissSilab
Whitecastle

(19:56:45) [ø] ChanMode: Greeny sets mode: [+V]

Should keep things to a minimal since I’m going out now.
